goDutch is a new-age fintech app that powers group payments for millennials. We’re on a mission to reimagine group payments and enable people to enjoy with their friends without any worry of awkward reminders, delayed payments, and multiple transactions.

We've first-hand seen that group payments are very tedious - one person first pays on behalf of the entire group, then calculates and makes a note of who owes whom how much, and then individually reminds each person to pay back. At goDutch, we are passionately working towards re-imagining this multi-step process that extends over numerous days and multiple apps. Our focus is on being design-led and driving cutting-edge fintech innovation.

goDutch is founded by IIT Bombay grads with a total work experience of 10+ years in fintech and we are backed by global VC investors including Y Combinator.

name: Hannah Life Technologies
short_description: An effective home-use fertility treatment for natural conception
long_description:
We are making a new fertility treatment that infertile couples can order with a click of a
button to help them conceive at home. Our technology increases the likelihood of pregnancy by guiding significantly higher number of sperms towards the ovum using a proprietary combination of surface features and microenvironment optimization.

The fertility treatments available today, such as in-vitro fertilization (IVF) and intra-uterine
insemination (IUI), are psychologically and financially draining and come with considerable treatment-associated risks. Furthermore, over 25 million women of reproductive age in the US
have limited nearby access to fertility treatment.

name: Able Jobs

long_description: We help companies hire entry-level non-tech in areas of sales, support, and marketing talent through short-term training programs. Users download our app, go through rigorous training programs, and get interviews in our client companies.

Smol Coach is a commerce platform for businesses which run on video. Instead of having to use multiple tools to schedule, create sessions, send video links and accept payments, Smol Coach integrates it all within a easy to use platform.

With Smol Coach, anyone can set up an online store, schedule and let clients book sessions, and sell their expertise. Smol Coach is ideal for small businesses and solo professionals.

name: StayQrious
short_description: StayQrious helps kids in India learn through online group classes,…
long_description: Imagine doing personalised workouts with a fitness coach, but for school subjects. Students log into their session that has been scheduled with their coach, they can see their learning workout for the day. Their workout typically consists of watching an interactive video, writing explanations, giving feedback to other students, making an explainer video etc. They get constant feedback and encouragement from the coach and progress only after they have understood the pre-requisites.

name: Chutney
short_description: Amazon for the next 300m Indians who are coming online now.
long_description:
We’re building Amazon for India’s mass market, the new middle class of 300m who are now coming online. Just like Amazon started with books when the US was coming online, we are starting with fresh fruits and vegetables that Indian families buy multiple times every week. 

There are over 450m Indians with access to the internet and smartphones, but only 150m of them buy online. This is because they find eCommerce apps and websites too complex to use. They also find it hard to trust an online business with no physical presence.

With Chutney, customers place their orders on Whatsapp and pick up the next day from a nearby store. All the orders are bulk shipped to the store, bringing down logistics cost.

Chutney is building a network of mom and pop stores spread across the city. Store owners share daily prices of fruits and vegetables with their customers on WhatsApp via the Chutney seller app. The app also has a simple interface for store owners to manage customer orders.

By using WhatsApp we are plugging into the existing customer behavior rather than force-fitting an app or website. Also, by partnering with mom and pop stores, we establish customer trust.

We launched 6 weeks ago in Coimbatore. We are doing over 700 orders a week amounting to $1400, growing at over 40% week on week. We are going after 60m new middle-class households, at 72 orders/year of $3 each, that is a $13b market opportunity for fresh fruits and vegetables alone.

Our vision is to build a chain of Chutney stores throughout the country, expanding across every little neighborhood and serving every need of our customers from fresh fruits and veggies to grocery and FMCG to even electronics and home appliances.

name: Newman's
short_description: Indonesia's first digital health clinic for men
long_description:
We are a consumer health tech company in Indonesia focusing on men's health, including hair loss, sexual health and smoking addiction

The issues we are addressing are often stigmatized in the region, causing embarrassment to men seeking treatment for their health. Today, patients go through a process that is (1) time-consuming (2) expensive consultation and medication (3) awkward physical consultation (4) confusion on what to do

Newman's improves patient's accessibility to doctor consultations and prescription drugs through remote consultations and improves affordability on medication by working directly with drug manufacturers.

Our software automates this design step and even calculates the bill of materials with project cost estimates.

TagMango is a marketplace where fans can book personalized video shoutouts from their
favourite influencers and celebrities. Like Cameo for India, imagine if your friend is a fan of
Justin Beiber, you purchase a video shoutout from Justin himself on TagMango.

It is probably the best time right now in India to convert followers into cash for 3 specific
reasons. One, digital platforms have 250mil+ MAUs, doubling YOY. Two, digital payments have
increased 55% YOY. And culturally, India has a crazy celebrity fan culture, where they’re accorded
demi-god status. From our experience as influencers in India, monetization for celebrities lack the
adequate infrastructure as opposed to in established markets.

Happy to be able to build such stable revenue streams for them.

name: Morphle

long_description: Microscopy Automation + Assistive Intelligence

name: Zeo Auto
short_description: Route Planning and fleet management software.
long_description:
Zeo Auto is a route optimisation and fleet management platform. 

Our route optimisation solutions are used by drivers and independent businesses to plan multistop deliveries via Zeo Route planner app.  

The fleet management solutions are used by fleet owners having 10 - 50 fleet size. We are a device agnostic player compatible 50+ protocols covering 80% of the market. We use GPS based location tracking and OBD installations as a hook to provide an array of services and integrations that help owners save time, money and improve vehicle and team's efficiency.

Zeo Auto supports fleet managers, independent drivers and businesses in managing end to end operations right from enabling driver communication, providing ETA, route planning, trip management, vehicle tracking (speed, distance and location), waybill generation, capturing orders etc. essentially making us a lifeline for this 35B$ logistics industry.

Our solutions have been used in 50 + countries. We have enabled 15000+ deliveries via our route planner app and growing at 80% WOW.  We have enabled 6mn+ trips via our fleet management solutions across 30000 trucks.

name: yBANQ
short_description: yBANQ is building a Bill.com for India to simplify collections and…
long_description: We are building a collections and reconciliation platform for MSME's in India. In India, reconciliation is largely manual and error prone due requiring manual matching of bank statements with Invoices. In my last role, I used to head product for PayU, India #1 Fintech firm. I would love to connect with other Fintech founders building solving similar problems and in the neobanking space

name: Thunderpod
short_description: Social Fitness App where content is consumed in the form of…
long_description:
Thunderpod is a social fitness app trying to solve the biggest problem we all face when it comes to fitness. You guessed it right! PROCRASTINATION (I'll start tomorrow and we all know tomorrow never comes)

Our bite-sized fitness content in the form of challenges has become a non-stop motivation for our users. These challenges are made by 250+ fitness influencers/creators on the platform.

name: EduRev
short_description: Learning App for 400M Indian Students like a Netflix for Education
long_description:
EduRev is a learning platform deep community and gamification layers initially building for 400M Indian Students. 

A product that helps students throughout the day for all formative years of their life, which improves them and they also have fun while improving themselves. 

Some Highlights: 

- EduRev App ​Crossed 1 Million+​ Downloads with over 850K​ MAUs

- ​50,000+​ users subscribed to our paid plan (and we sold in over 25 countries!)

- ​Backed by Y Combinator,​ famous founders and funds from across the globe 

If we execute successfully, Schools/Coaching/Colleges would just be meant for sports and networking while all the learning happens through EduRev!

name: Spenny
short_description: Acorns for India. Every time you swipe you make a digital…
long_description:
Spenny is the Acorns for India. Every time a user make any digital transaction, we round off the amount to the nearest 10 INR and invest it for them into a diversified portfolio, automatically.

400M millennials in India don't invest because they don't have enough time, knowledge or access to large capital. With Spenny, they just connect the card and invest every time they spend.

We're growing 67% WoW since launch, with 3,000+ users and $15,000 in AUM. Indians put $500Bn into their bank accounts annually. We charge 1.75% of the AUM for investments. That's a direct ~$9Bn market in India alone.

Potentially every time a user makes a transaction, we make money. And in that sense, the timing for Spenny couldn't have been better: 1 Trillion+ transactions are expected in 2021 because of factors like Whatsapp launching its P2P payments in India for its 400M users. And the emergence of UPI means every Indian has a virtual bank account now. 

More interesting revenue models develop from the transaction data insights of our users. We analyse the rich data to A) up-sell more financial products like insurance etc., and B) create brand loyalty programs & partnerships.

We acquire customers at minimal CAC by bank partnerships. We leverage the banks' existing users, by integrating with their mobile app. In turn, we invest into their mutual funds.

Our long-term vision is to become a one-stop asset management solution for millennials.

name: HireSweet
short_description: Find and hire the best passive job candidates.

name: Zumo Labs
short_description: We generate synthetic data for computer vision models.
long_description:
At Zumo Labs, we generate synthetic training data for computer vision models.

Computer vision is the essential technology that powers the products of the future: autonomous vehicles, smart retail, robotics, smart fitness, security and vision-based analytics. These algorithms require huge amounts of training data. This data is currently collected and labeled manually; a slow, imprecise, expensive process that is rife with bias and privacy issues. 

Zumo Labs solves all of these problems (and more!) by creating feature rich synthetic training data in the cloud: cheaper, faster to generate and iterate on, covers all the edge cases, and has no bias or privacy issues. 

Computer vision companies can spend 600k a year getting the data they need to power their products. This is a serviceable market of $3B which  has grown 60% per year in the last 2 years.

name: Synapsica Healthcare
short_description: AI-enabled automation of diagnostic radiology workflow and reporting.

name: Pahamify
short_description: College entrance test preparation App for students in Indonesia
long_description: Pahamify is an online learning platform for K-12 students in Indonesia. We provide high quality educational videos which can be used to learn various concepts ranging from math, science, social sciences, and language based on the local curriculum. We also provide thousands of practice questions and modules which can be used for college entry test preparation.

name: Easyplan
short_description: An AI-driven investment app for beginner investors in India
long_description:
Easyplan is an investment app for beginner investors in India (kind of a cross between Betterment and Qapital in the US). We also provide users with a credit card secured by their investments. 

We launched with money market funds and have ~40,000 customers who’ve invested (~40% MoM growth). The pandemic spurred interest among new investors, and our AUM has grown 3x since April 2020. And we’ve done this with a cost of acquisition that is 10% of the industry average. 

Here’s the problem we see. Only 10% of the 100 million middle-income Indian workers have invested in the markets. This is despite the fact that they save ~30% of their income, making this a $325B potential market in assets under management. 

However, current investment apps in India are built for active investors. With over 16,000+ mutual funds and 5000+ stocks to choose from, they are far too complicated for beginners, who make up most of the market.

We’re building an AI - driven investment planning software that is designed for beginners. Users use our conversational AI to get diversified mutual fund portfolios tailored to their goals. We also offer users a credit card secured by their investments, so they can earn return without losing liquidity.

In terms of business model, we make commissions on the asset we manage, and interchange fees on the fund. We estimate we can make $12 per user per year, which is 6x our current acquisition cost of $2 per investor.

name: adyn
short_description: The first test designed to prevent birth control side effects

name: Raycast
short_description: Speed up non-coding tasks for engineering teams
long_description: Raycast is a productivity tool that saves engineering teams time on non-coding tasks in apps like Jira, GitHub or Slack which might take up to 50% of a developer's day.

name: Angle Health

name: Breathe Well-being
short_description: A digital well-being program to help people prevent or manage chronic…
long_description:
Breathe Well-being helps people prevent or manage chronic lifestyle diseases by losing weight through its digital therapeutics program (weight-loss clinic in a cloud, think Noom for India). The program is delivered remotely over the phone and through the mobile app, therefore users are able to follow the lifestyle program from the convenience of their home. Our online program is 3X more effective at 1/4th the cost.

The user receives bi-weekly 1-1 coaching focused on behavioral changes, online community for support and motivation, and a mobile app that provides educational lessons, lifestyle tracking tools and weekly challenges (gamification). The content and behavioral change techniques are centred around healthy diet, fitness, lifestyle and stress reduction.

Our unique coaching methodology employs cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), goal-oriented treatment and self-efficacy enhancement. The coach helps the user bust negative emotions of past failures in weight-loss and increase motivation by linking short-term achievable goals with the user's personal values. Through the program, the user is able to self-identify triggers of unhealthy habit adoption and make better decisions.

Breathe Well-being has demonstrated success in helping people lose weight, build long-term healthy habits and reduce/eliminate medication for lifestyle diseases (example - Type 2 Diabetes). We are looking for ideas to improve our sales processes so that we can get users to enrol at a higher conversion rate post our 1-week free trial. We need to identify triggers when users are most likely to pay and provide them with a seamless process for paying on-the-spot.

name: OpenBiome
short_description: A nonprofit stool bank enabling access to fecal transplants.
long_description: We are a nonprofit stool bank, expanding safe access to fecal transplants and catalyzing research on the human microbiome.

long_description: Oda is a software app for providing self-guided apartment tours to prospective residents. With Oda prospects can schedule a tour, visit rental apartments, explore units and amenities, and find a unit they like at their own convenience. Our app allows property managers and landlords to automate apartment tours traditionally led by leasing agents, increasing prospect traffic and lease signings while reducing leasing costs.

name: Viya
short_description: Mobile first apartment rentals for LatAm
long_description: We make living in city centers affordable in LATAM. We offer room and apartment leases paired with seamless services (cleaning, maintenance, laundry, dry cleaning) to make our tenant's lives less hectic. With a current MRR at $60k growing 20% weekly for last 3 months with margins tracking 40%. Team is from MIT with background in real estate looking to improve rental experience for tenants and owners with technology.

name: delt.ai

long_description: delt.ai is building the first digital bank for businesses in Latam, set to tackle the +450B Market of business deposits in Mexico. delt.ai is a natively digital alternative to a bank, born with API integrations. Its truly digital KYC-compliant onboarding allowed us to be the first opening first branchless accounts in the country. We target poorly served SMEs and Freelancers therefore focusing on the ~40B market opportunity that are profitable when served fully online.

name: Orchata

long_description:
With Orchata food suppliers and local stores can become online grocery stores that sell and deliver food directly to consumer's homes.

Orchata is on a mission to help independent business owners grow and compete against major corporate chains. For wealthy Africans and their asset managers, investing in the global capital markets is cumbersome, expensive and practically inaccessible. In Nigeria, Africa's largest economy and home to 30% of all the wealth in Sub Saharan Africa (excluding South Africa), 99.99% of the investing population do not have access to invest globally. Even for the 0.01%, if you wanted to buy a US stock, you’d have to call your asset manager who would then call an international broker to execute a trade. This is inefficient & expensive!
We have a mobile app that allows individuals trade the US stock markets by themselves and a brokerage tool for asset managers to execute trades directly & manage multilple portfolios seamlessly.

GuruHotel is Shopify for the hotel industry. Independent hotels use our software to rebuild their hotel website, drive more direct bookings from online travel agencies (OTAs), and generate 30% more revenue. 

We have decades of experience building products and leading companies in the hotel industry, including founding and selling LastRoom, the HotelTonight for LATAM.

That’s where we learned that 73% of people who find a hotel room on Booking.com or Expedia also check the hotel website to see if the price is cheaper.  Independent hotels are missing these opportunities because they haven’t figured out that they should offer extras, discounts, and better user experience in order to drive bookings on their websites to avoid paying 15-25% commissions to OTAs.  We help them automate all of this.

Why now - Shopify did this for e-commerce allowing them to pull their content from Amazon - we will do this for hotels allowing them to gain freedom from Booking and Expedia.

name: Healthlane

long_description:
Healthlane is an app that enables 1.3B Africans to access modern online and offline healthcare services. Today we offer doctor bookings, chat with your doctor and we’re about to launch prescription delivery and lab results via the app. 

In February, we achieved $51k in net revenue - growing 350% in the last 6months. 98% of annual retention of our patinets. We have a 3 month payback time after launching a new hospital. Africa has the fastest growing middle class in the world. Today there’re 3B doctor consultations per year in Africa. At our $5 price per consultation booked via Healthlane, that’s a $15B market opportunity.

Before Healthlane, Dr Agbor and Alain have been consultants on digital health for Bill Gates health org (GAVI), United Nations, WHO and the World Bank. We’ve previously built and sold software to hospitals across Africa.

Our mission is to help local independent retailers find their best-sellers investors by matching them with the right supplier and brands.

We believe that today's evolution of the wholesale industry has stifled the growth of many SME businesses. The supply-chain in Malaysia and across Southeast Asia lacks meaningful real-time connectivity between suppliers and retailers. Hence we are determined to transform this industry by providing businesses the right tools to grow.

Our modern, digital approach to the wholesale industry allows retailers to discover, purchase, and manage inventories for their store - all on a single marketplace platform. And our software tool for suppliers helps businesses to deal with all the pain points of growing customer database, from ordering to payments.

With our data-driven approach, we connects local, independent retailers with the right brands, distributors, and wholesalers to stock their store with the best products. This saves retailers and suppliers time and money, allowing them to focus on what's most important: building and running their business.

Dropee is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

long_description:
Humanly automates job candidate screening for companies with high applicant volume. Candidates access Humanly on companies’ career pages, job boards and social media. Candidates then answer a set of screening questions to determine their role-fit, qualification, and the predicted impact they’ll make in the role through a dynamic, mobile-friendly conversation with Humanly.

Humanly is at $14K MRR across 16 customers including Farmers Insurance, Feather, Grin and BPM and are in security review with Moss Adams and Costco. The company has grown 100% since February 1st. 

On average companies spend 64 hours screening and scheduling candidates, per open role. Humanly's software automates consistent screening, schedules candidates, removes bias, and goes beyond the resume in understanding the qualifications of a candidate. Candidates rate Humanly's experience 4.9/5.

name: Equator Therapeutics
short_description: We are developing a drug to burn calories and increase metabolism…
long_description:
We are developing a drug to increase metabolism and burn calories without exercise.

Obesity and type 2 diabetes have reached epidemic proportions. There are 2.2B overweight people and 500M people with type 2 diabetes worldwide, and these numbers increase drastically every year. Existing drugs are not effective enough to reverse the trend. Our drug can solve this problem, because it addresses the root cause of metabolic disorders – the imbalance between caloric intake and expenditure.

Our drug will target mitochondria – the powerhouse of the cell – to generate heat. This approach has been proven to fully reverse obesity and type 2 diabetes in animals. However, therapeutic application for humans was impossible, because mitochondrial heat production could only be induced by highly artificial methods with side effects. This changed after our recent breakthrough discovery of the protein that mitochondria naturally use to generate heat. We have developed a unique high-throughput drug discovery platform to identify compounds that selectively activate this target protein, without side effects.

For decades people have wanted a drug that burns calories like exercise does. We are realizing this dream at Equator Therapeutics.

name: Belvo
short_description: Financial API platform for Latam. The easiest way to connect bank…
long_description:
We are Belvo, a financial API platform for Latam that enables any company or developer to access and interpret their end-users' financial information, through one easy-to-use API. Think Plaid for Latam.

Our vision is to power the next generation of financial services in Latam by enabling more inclusive, efficient and empowering offerings through tech and data. Latam is a very exciting and dynamic place to be right now and a great place to build infrastructure for the next generation of financial products for a huge market.

name: Menten AI
short_description: Menten AI designs protein drugs and enzymes using quantum computing…
long_description: Menten AI designs protein drugs and enzymes using quantum computing and machine learning. Their technology leapfrogs current computational methods making it possible to design previously intractable proteins. The team created the first protein design algorithm for current and near-term quantum computers and created the world’s first protein designed on a quantum computer. They are now working on 3 new proteins, including a peptide to prevent the spread of viruses like Covid-19. They have 2 paid pilot projects with multinational chemical companies and 4 LOI’s with pharma and biotech companies.

name: Legionfarm
short_description: We connect gamers with training and assistance from Pro players
long_description:
LegionFarm lets gamers pay to play with professional players, helping customers have more fun playing, learn to be a better gamer, and conquer difficult parts of video games.

Legionfarm Pros want to monetize their skills by turning their hobbies into real careers. They are the top 1% of players. They have a massive impact on the success of gaming companies - and we want to allow these top players to hold their dream jobs in virtual worlds.

Over the past year, Legionfarm organized over 400,000 gaming sessions with our 7,000 Pros.

Legionfarm provides access to unique entertainment on a global scale while creating new jobs in virtual worlds at the same time

name: Jenfi
short_description: Jenfi lends to small businesses in Asia based on revenue
long_description:
We lend to small businesses based on revenue. 

Over 99% of businesses in Asia are small businesses. Many of these businesses are highly "bankable" yet 50-70% are unable to obtain a loan.

Having been business owners ourselves, we experienced firsthand the struggles of funding a business - from expensive equity options to loans that required personal guarantees.

We went live in Singapore first to validate the product/market fit. We plan to expand across the APAC region..

Our sweet spot is backing repeatable business spend - expenses that leads to increased revenue. Our financing product allows businesses to keep growing with us over time. Over 25% of our loans today are from repeat borrowers.

We created a brand new asset class in Asia - offering flexible repayment options, such as tieing repayment with sales. Business owners LOVE this.

Our automated financial technology platform ingests revenue and alternative data sources that gives us a proprietary edge in understanding the behavior of our borrowers. As we collect continuous data, we are able to offer better financial and technology solutions, while mitigating our downside risk.

Funds are seamlessly deployed via our virtual Jenfi Wallet and MasterCard solution, giving borrowers flexibility to make payments while giving Jenfi real-time tracking of their spend.

Recent coverage: 
https://techcrunch.com/2020/02/03/jenfi-wants-to-solve-small-business-lending-in-southeast-asia/

name: Yassir
short_description: Yassir is the leading Super App for French Speaking Africa targeting…

name: Ochre Bio
short_description: Genomic medicines that rejuvenate transplanted livers.
long_description:
Many donor livers are too unhealthy or damaged to be transplanted and so go to waste, even though one in six patients die waiting for a new liver. The main reason for discarding a donor liver is that it contains too much fat. We rejuvenate these fatty donor livers by directly targeting over-active genes, making these livers transplantable. 

We use recent breakthroughs in genomics to find and shut down over-active genes driving disease, and then go straight to testing our therapies in discarded donor livers that we keep alive on a machine. This approach makes us better, cheaper, and faster than traditional drug discovery.

name: Carupi
short_description: Carupi is a managed P2P marketplace for used cars.
long_description:
Carupi is a managed P2P marketplace for used cars, very similar to Airbnb, reinventing the archaic experience of things such as Craigslist or car dealers through a transparent, easy and safe platform, similar to what Airbnb did to home rentals.

----

Carupi is a new app, where consumers can buy and sell cars with the push of a button. It is a managed peer-to-peer marketplace for used cars, very similar to Airbnb, that is reinventing the archaic experience of things such as Craigslist or car dealers through a transparent, easy, fair and safe platform, similar to what Airbnb did to home rentals.

The problem with car selling is that you only have two bad options: (i) if you sell to consumers, you don't know how to take car photos, where or how to properly advertise the car, or perhaps you want to advertise in too many places and managing this is complex and then you feel unsafe when meeting strangers, handling title transfer paperwork and to get paid; or (i) you can sell to dealers or "instant-cash offer" startups which give you bad prices since they need high margins to cover their high inventory and fixed costs. 

And car buying is equally bad: (i) you can buy from consumers on classifieds websites and face a terrible experience since meeting strangers is unsafe, there are a lot of scammers in these places not to mention that you may end up buying a lemon or not knowing how to handle paperwork and payment; or (ii) you can buy from dealers who are not well-intentioned and will hide problems because they are negotiating a one-off transaction.

Carupi, like Airbnb, manages the entire end-end transaction from taking photos, managing offers, facilitating test-drives, handling bureaucracy and payment and delivering the car to the buyer - all of that with contractors that are paid per job. 

During the transaction neither buyer nor the seller ever talk to each other or have to worry about safety. And while sellers get the best private-party values on their cars, buyers get fully certified cars for at-home test drives and after purchase.

The founder has previously started the largest consumer-to-business car marketplace in Brazil, leading it to $100M GMV, raising $30M. He is an electrical engineer undergrad with background at McKinsey, Goldman Sachs and MIT (GPA 5.0/5.0).

name: Jeeves
short_description: International banking infrastructure, starting with corporate cards…
long_description:
Today, most companies operate globally but their banks are local and country specific. Jeeves changes that.

Jeeves is building international banking infrastructure from scratch, starting with a 30 day corporate credit card and cross border payments for startups in Mexico, Europe and Canada.

Startups can start spending without any transfer of funds and pay us back in their local currency - Pesos, Pounds, Euros. We are building a true global corporate Amex competitor, targeting a $110 Billion dollar market.

Since launching 4 weeks ago, we are live with 20 international startups including Belvo, Verto and TrueHome. Monthly spend has doubled to $70,000 dollars and is growing 50% Week over Week 

We’re both serial entrepreneurs. I’m a Stanford grad, who previously worked at PayPal, and founded a 50 person B2B startup doing $35 million in revenue and my co-founder is a former JPMorgan credit trader that invested $200 million at a multicurrency hedge fund.

International banks don’t get it. They never will. They won’t see us coming.

We’re Jeeves. The first multi country, multi currency, international bank for global companies.

name: Roboflow

long_description:
Roboflow enables software engineers to create computer vision models without machine learning expertise. Our sweet spot is replacing all the random python scripts you need to write between getting your images labeled and training your model (think: converting annotations, checking class balance, preprocessing images, and hosting datasets).

We are also building integrations with labeling tools at the front end of the flow and training tools at the back end.

Customers in industries like RPA, self driving cars, mobile apps, agriculture, medical imaging, document digitization, and manufacturing.

name: SuperTokens
short_description: Helps companies securely manage their session tokens
long_description:
SuperTokens is the most secure solution for user session management - enabling robust prevention and detection of attacks.

We mitigate against all types of attacks (XSS, MITM, session fixation, CSRF etc) and are the only ones that we know of to reliably detect session theft (as per the official OAuth 2.0 specifications in RFC 6819). We have solved the scalability, race conditions and failure issues usually associated with this.

Our product, Amber, is an engagement bot that has relevant conversations with employees and proactively predicts those who are disengaged or about to leave, with the exact reasons why.

She's helped CXOs get an immediate pulse of employee pain points across teams and identify culture/diversity gaps that often go unnoticed. All this without any manual intervention or analysis required by their HR teams.

Hereon, we intend to expand Amber's capabilities to diagnose and solve mental health issues in the workplace.

Amazon has the best product recommendations. They use their historic sales data to create these recommendations. The problem though is that other e-commerce stores lack enough sales training data to do the same.

We've solved this problem. The Depict.ai algorithm increases overall e-commerce revenue by 4-6% for any store without needing any sales data at all.

Through QuestDB, companies can harness the power of time series data by handling billions of time-stamped events without relying on powerful hardware.

name: Queue
short_description: Platform for providing services online built for creatives
long_description:
Queue enables passionate people to start providing services online in the easiest way possible. We give you a beautiful portfolio that showcases your work, get feedback on your work, and get paid for your work.


**Vision**

The vision of the company is to build a platform that makes it easy for anyone from a freelancer to a large agency to run their business. We want to scale this to anyone in the passion economy. Everyone from video production studios to online esport coaches. 


**How we started**
Masud and JP founded this company in 2019 with one goal in mind. Make it extremely easy to collaborate and provide digital services. We originally released Queue to eSport coaches to review gameplay videos and is now used by thousands of coaches, video producers, and more.
