long_description: There are 10 million dialysis and bypass surgeries per year, but half of them fail. VenoStent saves lives with a wrap that goes around blood vessels during surgery so they don't fail.

name: Volopay
short_description: Brex for South East Asia - Corporate cards & automated payments.
long_description:
Volopay is a modern spend management platform that saves companies time and money by giving visibility & control to every aspect of business spending. With Volopay, finance and accounting teams can control expense requests and approvals, make bill payments (domestic/cross-border), manage company cards, and reconcile all accounting on one platform.

Volopay completely eliminates the need for expense reports and reimbursements while giving everyone in the company a card to use. We worked in an offshore dev centre in the past and it took 2 months to get our reimbursements and 4 weeks to make any purchase as there was just one corporate card for the entire company and clunky bill payments solutions offered by the banks. 

Among our customers are Reddoorz (OYO of South East Asia), Dathena (biggest data security co in Singapore) and Beam (APAC’s leading micro-mobility player).

name: Strive School
short_description: Training the next generation of software engineers in Europe 🇪🇺
long_description: In exchange for a part of their future salary, select students can become professional-grade software engineers through a six-month online program. While the majority of universities in Europe are free to attend, STEM courses are often outdated and theoretical; Strive School works with those pursuing STEM fields to help them become job-ready software engineers.

name: Explorex (Formerly Eatable)
short_description: Order ahead from restaurants in India using your smartphone!
long_description:
We are building a software platform that allows customers to view a rich media digital menu on their phones and place advance orders to restaurants for takeaway or dine-in.

Indians still have to search for restaurant details online in order to call and place order ahead, the Indian restaurant still depends on calls and pen-paper to manage orders which makes this a broken and time-consuming process.

name: Jumpstart
short_description: U.S. business formation for international founders
long_description: Jumpstart makes it easy for international entrepreneurs to start and manage their U.S. company. As a non-resident, you can use Jumpstart to file your business, tax ID, and bank account so you can access U.S. business services like Stripe, PayPal, credit cards, loans and more.

name: Kuleana
short_description: Impossible foods of seafood.
long_description: Creating plant-based seafood which is enhanced through biotechnology. We are on route to create products to mimic and even pass existing animal options in terms of taste and texture. First product is plant-based raw tuna.

name: Electry
short_description: LinkedIn for skilled blue-collar workers
long_description: Electry helps skilled blue-collar workers like electricians and mechanics to find better full-time jobs. With only 10 minutes of effort, our users get job offers that pay them up to 50% more than they are making today.

name: GitDuck
short_description: Zoom for developers
long_description: GitDuck is a video calling tool for developers. It enables pair programming, real-time code sharing and other collaborative features for remote engineering teams.

name: Known Medicine
short_description: Finding the best treatment for cancer patients, faster
long_description: Known Medicine helps oncologists determine the best cancer treatment for patients, faster. We do this by breaking down a patient's tumor into many micro tumors, and treat each with different drugs to see which it responds best to.

name: Frontline
short_description: Cloud security and compliance - automated
long_description: Frontline gives developers, no matter their security experience, the ability to launch virtual machines with built-in security and PCI compliance. We eliminate the painstaking process of hardening cloud environments that take days/weeks to complete.

name: Charityvest
short_description: The simplest way to offer a charitable giving benefit for employees.
long_description:
We're building a zero-fee charitable payments platform. Our first product is Charityvest, a free charitable giving fund for any and every donor.
- Commit to give to charity by making tax-deductible contributions to your fund.
- Send donations to any charity, or share giving gifts with others, from your fund.
- Receive one tax receipt for all the giving you do.
- Zero fees. Your charities receive 100% of your donation.

Start giving freely by opening your free Charityvest fund at Charityvest.org.

name: Hypotenuse
short_description: Automatically generate copywriting for e-commerce
long_description: Hypotenuse automatically generates copywriting for e-commerce companies, including product descriptions, advertising text and blog posts. Every year, e-commerce companies spend billions on copywriting -- it is expensive, inconsistent in quality and slow. Hypotenuse instantly replaces all of this by generating this content in seconds, in a way that matches the company's writing style while maintaining human-level fluency.

name: Kosmos
short_description: Control center for your microservices
long_description: Kosmos is a control center for your micro-services. It acts as a UI layer for your infrastructure - a centralized catalog to track ownership and metadata around the software running at your company, observe and manage the changes across your distributed infrastructure and tooling, and ensure their production-readiness from one single location.

name: BukuWarung
short_description: Accounting app for 60M micro-businesses in Indonesia
long_description:
BukuWarung's vision is to empower 60 million micro-merchants in Indonesia to become financially aware and enable them to manage and grow their business using our technology platform starting with digital bookkeeping and payments.

BukuWarung is an accounting app that helps small and micro businesses to manage their cash and credit transactions. Merchants receive 3x faster repayments and see increased cash flow due to the automatic payment reminders sent by the app. The app tracks all transactions including credit, expense and sales, and helps merchants get cash flow visibility through business reports.

BukuWarung raised its back to back Pre-A and Seed funding rounds in 2020 led by Quona Capital, East Ventures. AC Ventures, Golden Gate Ventures, Tanglin Venture Partners and Michael Sampoerna joined the round along with strategic angel investors from Grab, Gojek, Flipkart, PayPal, Airbnb, Snapdeal, Xendit, Rapyd, Mastercard, Funding Societies and others.

name: Farmako Healthcare
short_description: India's first Centralized EMR App for Doctors, Clinics
long_description:
We are building India's first centralized EMR App for more than 80% of doctors in India who still work on paper. 

You as a patient can visit all hospitals using Farmako, and all your lab reports and prescriptions from different doctors get automatically uploaded into your health record.

name: CoreCare
short_description: Eliminating Patient Data Errors in Healthcare
long_description: Corecare automatically matches patient data between healthcare providers, insurance companies, and the government to eliminate patient data errors in healthcare. This problem is significant - 20% of Electronic Health Records have a patient data error (something as simple as mistyping a patient's date of birth) which leads to over $800B a year in administrative costs for the industry.

name: Speedscale
short_description: Save developers time by simulating APIs with actual traffic
long_description: Apps with micro services have insufficient testing. It’s impossible to validate the code because of too many dependencies. Speedscale solves this by automatically generating the tests, environment and data from traffic. These scenarios are continuously run as developers modify code to catch issues early and prevent incidents from impacting production environments.

name: BlaBla EdTech
short_description: Interactive Tiktok for Language Learning
long_description: We are making language learning fun and effective. You can think of us as Interactive Tiktok for language learning.

name: Minimall
short_description: Pinduoduo for Europe. Customers save 50% buying directly from…
long_description:
Hi, we’re Minimall. 

Minimall is Pinduoduo for Europe. Customers save 50% buying directly from factories in China. 
We started selling facemasks during covid and made 450k $ in 6 weeks. Now we’re selling home & electronics goods.
In Europe 30% of all products originate from China; we get the best prices by partnering with factories and selling in Europe with our group-buying app.
We are 3 french-chinese cofounders living in both Paris and Shenzhen, with over a decade of experience working with chinese factories. 
Like Pinduoduo, you have to group-buy with friends or family to get the discount. That makes customer acquisition 20 times cheaper, those savings are passed on to customers. 
Last year, with this model, customers bought $ 100B from Pinduoduo.
We’re Minimall, we’re bringing that model to Europe!

Additional adressed field: product's lifecycle

name: Humanloop
short_description: Train and deploy NLP with 10x less labelled data
long_description: A platform for annotating, training and deploying Natural Language Processing models.

name: ilk
short_description: ilk helps parents set up and manage child care pods
long_description: ilk is a marketplace that helps parents set up shared child care in their homes. We connect 2-5 families who live near each other with a nanny or preschool teacher they can share, we help them coordinate logistics, and manage payments.

name: TANGObuilder
short_description: TANGObuilder automates structural engineers jobs.
long_description: Today the building design process is cumbersome and expensive. Architects submit their design to structural engineers for validation. Engineers need to design all structural elements such as walls, columns, and beams to ensure the structure will not collapse and complies with regulations.  The structural engineer needs four to six weeks to generate the initial solution. The engineer will submit his proposal to the architect and then engage in an extensive back and forth discussion until they agree on a satisfying solution. TANGObuilder generates the building structural design in real-time, cutting six weeks of the overall process, and reducing material usage by 30%.

name: Arist
short_description: Workforce training via text message
long_description: Arist is the text message learning platform. We help Fortune 500 companies and governments rapidly teach and train employees, entirely via text message.

name: Cradle
short_description: B2B payments network in India
long_description: Cradle is a B2B payments network in India that lets small businesses collect online payments from other businesses for free.

name: Omni
short_description: Fast, up-to-date answers for Sales & Support
long_description: Omni is an intelligent chrome extension to help teams manage their internal knowledge and keep it 100% up to date. It fits in the natural workflow, integrates with current knowledge sources, and provides bite-sized answers when needed.

name: Workbase
short_description: Data & workflow platform for B2B account teams
long_description:
We help B2B companies reduce churn and grow customer spending. 
Our product gives account managers access to data dashboards and priority checklists needed to proactively save customers and upsell them to more profitable products.

Most companies have all the data they need to figure this out, but it’s often locked away in 20 different systems. There is no central place for an account manager to easily prioritize which customers to focus on and what actions to take to help them. Workbase is the solution, by one-click integrating the data sources and customizing the interface and actions for each company.

When working on similar internal tools at companies like Segment, we saw first-hand that proactively managing the customer journey could increase net retained revenue by as much as 20 percent.

name: BLISSWAY
short_description: Solving Highway Congestion
long_description: BLISSWAY is developing a new tolling technology that gives cities the ability to maintain free flow conditions on highways 24/7, with massive monetization of road assets as a byproduct. We achieve this by developing roadside solar-powered cameras, state-of-the-art ML & optimization algorithms, and smartphones. Our first pilot was deployed in Colorado in August of 2020.

name: Layer
short_description: Instant staging servers for every code change
long_description:
Traditional CI approaches need you to mix Dockerfiles with a big yaml blob to define the actual pipeline.

Layer turns this pattern on its head - we extended the Dockerfile to make it specifically for testing:
- It's only one file, so you can write CI configurations without looking at docs
- Our runners are fully featured VMs, and we take memory snapshots instead of just the filesystem so you can restore a configured Redis instance from a previous pipeline.

Benefits:
- We're a developer laptop in the cloud: your tech stack can come in any shape
- Get a unique link to share the frontend changes for every commit - we'll spin up the environment whenever it's requested, so you don't have to pay to keep them up
- CI runs significantly faster because you can set up your environment (e.g., `docker-compose up -d`) once, and rewind to that snapshot for every following pipeline.
- It's easier to onboard team members because they just have to read the single Layerfile to understand the whole CI process (incl. how to install everything)
- Debugging is easier because you can enter a web console into the last snapshot up to a week after a test passed or failed

name: Opvia
short_description: Airtable for Scientists.
long_description: Opvia is Airtable for scientists.  Today, when scientists do experiments, they store their data in Excel.  So we built Opvia.  Opvia keeps the simplicity of spreadsheets, but adds powerful features specific to scientific workflows.

name: Bits
short_description: Bits is a digital credit card that helps people build credit

name: Atomic
short_description: API that lets companies embed investment accounts into their services
long_description: With our API any company that holds consumer deposits (e.g. savings apps) can easily embed professionally managed investment accounts into their services.

name: MarketForce 360
short_description: Salesforce for Retail Distribution in Africa.
long_description:
MarketForce 360 is enabling FMCG companies to manage their field sales activities and grow their distribution channels in Africa. 

Today, 90% of retail transactions occur through informal channels, with millions of corner shops and field sales agents acting as the first point of contact between retailers and brands. 

With MarketForce 360's mobile app, sales agents record sales activities as they happen, including orders, visits, deliveries, payments, and feedback. The data is then visible in real-time to manufacturers, distributors, and financial service providers, enabling them to monitor and optimize their sales and distribution channels across agents, shops, and regions.

MarketForce 360 is already enabling trade across 50,000+ retailers, and $250 million in transactions have been processed through the platform to date. We recently raised $500,000 in seed funding from ViKtoria Ventures, EchoVC Partners, P1 Ventures, Ventures Platform and a group of strong angel investors.

name: Vectrix
short_description: Scan your cloud & SaaS apps for security issues in minutes and clicks.
long_description:
Vectrix is the first SaaS platform for one-click cloud and SaaS security scanners. Simply choose the coverage you need, connect your accounts, and start monitoring for critical security issues instantly, like misconfigurations, suspicious activity, and more.

Whether it's AWS and GitHub or G Suite and Salesforce, Vectrix has you covered.

Founded by former security engineers and security leaders at PlanGrid, Vimeo, and Autodesk, Vectrix equips engineers and growing security teams with an easy, effective way to bootstrap cloud and SaaS security.

Learn more at https://vectrix.io

--

TechCrunch: "Vectrix is developing cloud security marketplace built for and by security pros"

Read here: https://tcrn.ch/2Xt8PqK

name: Osmind
short_description: Software and insights for precision mental health
long_description: There are 22M+ Americans who suffer from treatment-resistant mental health conditions, meaning they’ve failed two or more conventional treatments. Our mission is to further innovative mental treatments (ranging from FDA-approved psychedelic medicine to neuromodulation) for those who are suffering the most. We do this by empowering providers, improving patient care, and accelerating research. Our software is used by mental health doctors and their patients. We analyze multimodal data from the software to help the doctors deliver better care and also offer insights to help research and development of new treatments that actually work. Together, we can usher in the mental health revolution and help solve our world's mental health crisis.

name: Biocogniv
short_description: AI-powered diagnostics for hospitals
long_description: Biocogniv makes AI-powered diagnostic tools for hospitals. Our products are plugins for electronic health records systems (EHRs), and our first product can screen patients for COVID-19 by analyzing standard blood test results – instantly, and with 95% sensitivity.

name: Daybreak Health
short_description: Online counseling, designed for teens
long_description: We offer online counseling services designed for teens.  Licensed therapists provide science-backed programs to teens enabled by data and our mobile app.

name: Mesh
short_description: Social network for remote companies to drive goals & feedback
long_description: Mesh, is an internal social network for companies, that makes it easy, for employees to accomplish goals, and get timely feedback, especially in remote teams. It looks like Facebook, and instead of filling boring HR forms, employees like & comment, on each other’s progress.

name: Yotta Savings
short_description: Save money and win prizes up to $10m through weekly number draws.
long_description: Users save money, get over 2x the national average in interest and weekly chances to win additional prizes up to $10 million through weekly random number drawings.

name: ZipSchool
short_description: Live, online classes for kids K-5
long_description: We're building live, remote classes for kids aged K-5 that specialize in topics not often taught in school like robotics, dancing, and art. For example, if your 9 year-old is really into making YouTube videos then you can sign her up for our video-editing class which she can complete right from home.

name: KeyDB
short_description: The only database you'll ever need
long_description: KeyDB is a fast key value database that combines in memory caching and FLASH persistence in a single package.

name: Tappity
short_description: Interactive Netflix for Kids
long_description: We're making Tappity, an interactive app designed to spark a child's curiosity in the sciences. Imagine if Bill Nye the Science Guy could react to your touch or voice inputs--that's what we're building.

name: Stacker
short_description: Turns spreadsheets into internal apps and customer portals
long_description:
We let you create applications for your team, your partners or your customers, powered by the data you're already using.

Connect in your spreadsheets, Airtable or database and we'll automatically create an app for you.

name: Hellometer
short_description: Making fast food faster
long_description:
Hellometer helps fast food owners' grow same store sales using security cameras to improve customer wait times.

Speed of service is fast food's core value proposition (it’s literally in the name) and owners currently don't have a reliable way to measure it. We show them when and where they have slowdowns and for every 7s they improve service times, owners see 1% increase in revenue.

name: Justo
short_description: Helps restaurants take online orders directly from customers
long_description:
At Justo, which means “fair” in Spanish, we aim to give restaurant owners access to technology that will help them increase their sales, at a more fair price. We provide restaurants their own online store, we teach them about advertising and marketing, and we automate the process for them. We also offer last-mile delivery service.

We are in Chile, Peru and Mexico.

Our goal is to create a service that is profitable for restaurants and for us.

https://files.getjusto.com/app/images/demos.gif

name: NeXtera Robotics
short_description: We enable companies to hire Industrial Robots like they hire employees
long_description: Software Platform for companies to hire Industrial Robots like they hire employees - on a monthly or hourly payment

name: Statiq.
short_description: India's Largest EV charging network
long_description: Statiq connects electric vehicle owners to EV chargers. EV owners can discover chargers near them, pre-book a slot and pay for the usage conveniently. Property owners can buy, share their chargers, manage them and earn by becoming charger hosts with Statiq. Our EV chargers can be found at shopping malls, workplaces, restaurants , hotels, residential spaces.

name: Oico
short_description: B2B marketplace for construction material in Brazil.
long_description: Oico is the best way for large contractors in Brazil to buy construction material. We replace the time-consuming work of managing orders, deliveries and payments across dozens of suppliers, with a one-stop solution.

name: Batch
short_description: Observability and replays for messaging systems
long_description:
We enable companies that use messaging platforms like Kafka the ability to gain visibility into their queues and most importantly, gain the ability to replay any events that have passed through their bus.

Event replay is rooted in event sourcing and while "replay" is often touted as one of the best features of event driven arch, it is difficult and costly to achieve. With our platform, any engineering org can reap the benefits of event replay without breaking the bank.

name: Vitable Health
short_description: Affordable primary and urgent care health coverage
long_description: We're an on-demand healthcare coverage company that provides acute and preventative coverage to the 40 million uninsured and 38 million under-insured Americans. We've rethought how healthcare should work by vertically integrating acute care. We send our Board-Certified providers directly to our members' homes, places of work, or via telemedicine, providing a transformative healthcare experience and dramatically lowering the cost of providing acute and preventative care. To make this new care-delivery model possible, technology is at the heart of everything we do.

name: Balance
short_description: The first B2B Checkout Platform
long_description: Balance is the easiest way for B2B marketplaces, merchants, and service providers to process payments online. We raised our last funding round from Lightspeed, Stripe, and Max Levchin to build 'Stripe for B2B'. Balance offers the first business checkout, enabling business customers to pay How they want (check, card, bank) and When they want (net terms, payment plans, invoice payments). this is achieved while the seller receives the funds instantly and easily like card payment.

name: Flocknet
short_description: Generate leads from your company's Twitter following.
long_description: Flocknet is building a search engine for people, starting with your Twitter Graph. Founders are already using this to recruit engineers, and investors are using us to source hot deals. Our customers include entrepreneurs, journalists, youtubers, and more.

name: Plerk
short_description: We modernize perks and benefits in emerging markets
long_description:
We help companies to give local and remote employees flexible benefits and perks, no matter geography.
A virtual card with benefits to pay for flexible perks for local and remote teams worldwide. Companies define budget, choose the programs of perks as general or granular as they decide, deploy money and give employees the power to decide the merchant. Company has total control, just one bill. Employees choose what they really need and want.

name: Clew
short_description: Unified file system for the cloud.
long_description: Clew lets employees see and organize files across their work apps from one place.

name: WareIQ
short_description: Amazon-like next day delivery for eCommerce companies in India
long_description:
We are building an on-demand Fulfillment network and all software tools in a central platform which is required for an Etailer to manage their eCommerce Fulfillment operations.

Etailers connect all their stores to our platform and send us their inventory. Whenever an order is placed on any of the channels, our Decision Engine allocates order to the nearest Warehouse holding the inventory, and right courier partner to pick & deliver to the end customer.

name: In Stock
short_description: Find any product, in stock nearby
long_description: In Stock makes it easy to shop from local stores and get it delivered that day.

name: PolyOps
short_description: Performance analytics for D2C brands
long_description: PolyOps helps eCommerce Brands optimize their business. We provide visibility into their unit economics, marketing channels and customer retention, allowing Brands to identify their best customers and measure campaign effectiveness. We are a data first company; we load it, transform it, and tell stories with.

name: Bikayi
short_description: Shopify for India
long_description: An app to help SMBs create their whatsapp integrated online stores without hassle as easy as forwarding messages on whatsapp.

name: Decentro
short_description: API platform for banking integrations (Plaid for India and APAC)
long_description:
Almost every company that has to integrate with the legacy financial institutions, faces several challenges when it comes to the product cycle. Not only are the APIs and documentations less available, but they are also old school and ridden with errors and loopholes. 

On top of that, the lack of a single point of contact from the underlying institutions, makes the already long integration cycle of 5 months feel like a temple run between different departments. And since those services break and update over time, you can imagine the nightmare in terms of coordination between the tech teams. 

We are a full-stack platform where you can come, select your desired modules, play in the sandbox, and launch your product with the APIs and SDKs within a couple of weeks! Not only that, but we also take care of all upcoming fixes, iterations, and updates without breaking any flow.

It's that easy, as it should be. Welcome to the future.

name: Notabene
short_description: Swift network for crypto
long_description:
Notabene helps businesses perform crypto transactions in a regulatory compliant way. Think of us as the SWIFT network for Crypto.

New global regulations for crypto transactions are here and will be enforced over the next year. Businesses now have to follow strict rules similar to banks, or shut down. 

We provide a SaaS platform that allows businesses to perform due-diligence on their counter-parties and manage the risk of incoming and outgoing transactions.

name: Piepacker
short_description: Play classic retro video games online with your friends for free
long_description: Play games like Street Fighter, Bomberman, Sonic, Metal Gear Solid or Crash Team Racing from any device with your friends online.  Turn on our voice and video chat for a full couch gaming experience and make it a party with filters and 3D masks. Play tons of mini games and challenges based on your favorite franchises.

name: Aquarium Learning
short_description: We help ML teams improve their models by improving their datasets
long_description:
ML models are only as good as the datasets they're trained on, and that means that most improvement to model performance comes from improvement to the quality and diversity of their datasets.

Our tooling makes it easy for ML teams to find anomalies + failure patterns in their datasets and fix these problems by editing / adding the right data. So the next time you retrain your model, it just gets better.

name: Mailwarm
short_description: Prevents marketing emails from landing in spam.
long_description:
Mailwarm is a marketing software which takes care of your email deliverability so your emails reach your recipients' inboxes.
Mailwarm allows you to :
- get a perfect email activity 
- raise your sender reputation
- keep your email deliverability high

name: Memberstack
short_description: Add user accounts and payments to any website with one line of code
long_description:
Memberstack makes it easy to add user accounts and recurring payments to static websites, Webflow, Squarespace, and more! 

We’ve helped 1000+ companies generate millions in recurring revenue, and we’re just getting started 😁 If we succeed, Memberstack will enable hundreds of thousands of people to create powerful web apps and massive online businesses.

Memberstack is backed by some incredible leaders, advisors, and investors who helped build the companies we use every day. Check the link for more info 👇

https://www.memberstack.com/blog/1000-customers-and-fundraise

name: Mozper
short_description: A debit card and app designed for kids and parents in Latin America
long_description: Mozper is bringing the weekly allowance into the digital era in Latin America. About 70% of the population in the region has never received formal financial education, and do not have the right tools to teach their children. In Brazil and Mexico alone, parents give more than $10B each year in pocket money to kids. Currently, parents must choose between giving their kids cash or handing over their own credit/debit cards. Mozper is a debit card and app where parents can give their kids an allowance, set spending rules (so they can't blow it all on video games), assign chores and even create and track savings goals. Mozper is currently available in Mexico.

name: Plum Mail
short_description: Plum Mail is an alternative to email that supercharges your…
long_description:
Plum Mail is a premium blend of email and instant messaging creating the best digital communication experience available online today.

To do this, we’ve built a unique, open communication platform from the ground up that allows us to design powerful features that users love.

name: Tella
short_description: Collaborative video creation in the browser.

name: Sameplan
short_description: Project management for sales teams and their prospects.
long_description: Sameplan is a customer-facing collaboration tool that enables sales teams to align with prospects, increase efficiency, and close more business. Enterprise deals can be very complex, rather than managing these high-value relationships over email, Sameplan acts as the central hub for the deal.

name: Kingdom Supercultures
short_description: New foods with microbes
long_description: Kingdom Supercultures designs novel microbial cultures that make it easy for food manufacturers to create exciting new foods.  We've developed the world's first 0-calorie fermented sodas, beers with entirely new flavors, and novel plant-based dairy replacements.

name: Liyfe
short_description: Cancer Patient Symptom Tracking, Management, and Education platform
long_description: Liyfe Clinic is an Oncology Patient-Reported Outcome Platform for Symptom Tracking, Management, and Education. Patients can use our app-based solution to track symptoms, access personalized education resources and access oncology certified nurses 24/7. Clinical trials showed the benefits—higher survival rate, better quality of life, less ER visits and hospitalizations.

name: Oco Meals
short_description: Delivering prepared meals for your week from local catering companies
long_description: Oco Meals is a platform that delivers prepared meals from local catering companies. We are the most convenient way to get a fresh meal - like a personal chef, but starting at $40/week.

name: TyltGO
short_description: TyltGO powers retailers with same-day delivery.
long_description: TyltGO provides brick & mortar retailers and e-commerce brands with same-day delivery under their own brand name.

name: Scrimba
short_description: A online coding school that is both personalized and scalable
long_description: Scrimba is a coding course platform with over 120K monthly active students. It's based on a new video format that makes the screencasts fully interactive for students, and easier to create for teachers. Our vision is to create a coding school that has the quality of Stanford but the price of a gym membership.

name: Virtually
short_description: The Shopify for Online Schools
long_description:
We help build and scale online schools by bringing together payments, live classes, and student management. 

Traditionally, schools have to either hire an engineering team or duct-tape dozens of different tools together. Virtually makes it easy bringing it all together in one easy-to-use solution.

name: Jika
short_description: Price A/B Testing for Shopify

name: Papercups
short_description: Open Core Intercom Alternative
long_description:
Papercups is an open core live chat widget that you can embed on your website or mobile apps. 
We provide a self-hosted alternative to Intercom for companies that are privacy and security contentious like companies in  fintech and healthcare.

name: OneKey
short_description: Mobile keyboard to schedule, access CRM, & add todos — in any app.
long_description:
OneKey is solving the pain & inefficiency of working on mobile.

We put all your work apps into the 1 thing you use the most one your phone -- your keyboard.

You can schedule meetings, update CRM, & more in 1 click, without leaving the messaging apps you are in (Gmail, iMessage, Linkedin, etc..)

We make scheduling meetings as easy as sending emojis

name: Hotplate
short_description: We let Chefs sell home-cooked food online
long_description: Hotplate lets Chefs sell home-cooked food online. Our software manages creating menus, handling orders, and offering delivery. We take the hassles out of running a food operation so any Chef can grow their own home-cooked food business.

name: Farel
short_description: Shopify for regional airlines
long_description: Farel is Shopify for regional airlines. We offer plug & play software to regional airlines to distribute their content and organize their operations. We provide their entire backend inventory and reservation system, as well as a customer-facing mobile app and fully-functioning website.

name: Drapr
short_description: Try on clothing online
long_description: Drapr lets shoppers try on clothing, online. Apparel brands use Drapr to make more money online.

name: Minimum
short_description: Automatically tracks & offsets your emissions at the point of spend
long_description:
Minimum is an app that revolutionises the way people can manage and reduce their carbon impact, and makes it effortless to live a carbon neutral life. This is roughly how it works:
	- We start by showing you your carbon footprint in real time by using Open Banking technology to automatically track the carbon impact of each transaction you make as your making it (e.g. if you’ve just bought a sandwich, we’ll add the carbon impact of that sandwich to your ongoing carbon footprint)
	- With that information, we then give you hyper-personalised coaching on how to reduce your emissions across your lifestyle, from behavioural changes to where to shop
        - Finally we’ll automatically neutralise your remaining footprint by investing your money into the best offsetting projects around the world, normally for the price of about 2 cups of coffee a week! 

Revolutionising how easy it can be to manage your carbon impact effectively is the first step. The long term vision it that Minimum will make it so effortless, and so accessible live with a net carbon impact of zero that carbon neutral becomes the new normal for everyone. And to give you a sense of the positive environmental impact that would have: if just the 3% richest people were living carbon neutral effortlessly it would be the equivalent of making all transport in the whole world emissions free!

name: Cohere
short_description: Instantly see what your users are seeing

name: PANADATA
short_description: We run background checks on businesses using data from public records…
long_description:
We run background checks on businesses using data from public records in Panama.

Trusted locally by largest banks, law firms, banking regulators, ports, foreign embassies, law enforcement. Our main use cases are due diligence, commercial intelligence and compliance.

name: Sidekick
short_description: Always-on video device built for remote teams
long_description: If your team is remote, but you want the closest possible experience to working together in-person - email us and we'll set you up with Sidekicks within a week.

name: Akiflow
short_description: Akiflow is a Productivity Assistant for Business Apps.
long_description:
From spotlight-like interface, users can:
- Execute commands like ‘asana new task’ or ‘calendar create event’
- Get analytics and ads reports in seconds
- Search for any data across the workspace.

It comes with many utilities to help the user save time and increase focus and productivity.

name: Maytana
short_description: Financial command center for multinational startups

name: Orange Health
short_description: Enables doctors in India to set up a full service clinic online
long_description:
At Orange Health we are trying to revolutionize telemedicine by offering not just consultations but the entire treatment in real-time. 
Doctors on Orange Health can talk to their patients, hear their heartbeat, send eMedics to treat them at home instantly.

name: Henry
short_description: We train the best software engineers in LatAm
long_description: We train software developers for free and help them find a job in exchange of a share of their future income.

name: Sutra
short_description: Run your fitness business online
long_description: Sutra is the only tool fitness trainers need to build an online business. We help them sell classes, on-demand content, and retreats.

name: CarbonChain
short_description: We help companies automate the accounting of their carbon emissions
long_description: We’re building a SaaS tool that enables companies in highly polluting industries to track their supply chain carbon emissions so they can mitigate risks from incoming carbon taxes and government penalties.

name: Supabase
short_description: The open source Firebase alternative.
long_description:
We are building the features of Firebase using enterprise-grade, open source products. Wherever possible, we support existing open source tools and communities. If those tools don’t exist, we build and open source them ourselves.

We are 100% remote.

name: SockSoho
short_description: India's largest direct-to-consumer sock brand for men

name: Together Video Chat
short_description: Interactive video chat made for kids and families
long_description: Together transforms the way kids and grown ups participate in a video call by providing educational activities, books and interactive games that can be played while video chatting.

name: Letter
short_description: Beautifully designed banking for high net-worth individuals.
long_description: Letter is a beautifully designed banking and financial platform made exclusively for high net-worth individuals. We make it easy to give customized debit cards to family members and staff, automatically donate to charity, and get access to exclusive investment and lending opportunities through our marketplace.

name: Ready
short_description: Software for local ISPs and their 50 million subscribers
long_description: Ready makes it easy for America's thousands of local internet service providers to solve the digital divide through powerful tools to operate, grow, and finance their networks. Ready's enterprise platform helps local ISPs acquire, retain, and monetize subscribers, to offer subscription contracts, and to cross-sell network-dependent services, such as advanced telehealth. With Ready, ISPs can reward loyal subscribers, run promotional & refer-a-friend campaigns before construction, efficiently finance growth, build the edge resources needed for delivering advanced digital services, and more.

name: DraftWise
short_description: Draft contracts faster.
long_description: DraftWise makes law firms draft contracts faster by giving each lawyer instant access to the firm's collective knowledge and previous contracts. A credit agreement takes 30 hours to draft; a lawyer with DraftWise can do it in 10.

name: SafeBase
short_description: Security Status Page for B2B SaaS Companies
long_description: SafeBase uses cloud security integrations to monitor, maintain, and present startup security programs. Have your security status available before your customer asks.

name: Spenmo
short_description: Bill.com for SMBs in SE Asia

name: Backlot
short_description: The collaborative design tool for the film and video ad industry.…
long_description: Backlot is the Collaborative Design tool for the film and video ad industries. Figma for filmmakers. Backlot enables video creators to simulate their entire film in 3D, easily, accurately and collaboratively before stepping into the high risk pressure cooker that is production.

name: Afriex
short_description: Stablecoin remittances
long_description: Afriex makes it easy for immigrants to send money home.  We use stablecoins to offer the fastest and cheapest remittance service to over 30 countries around the world.

name: Lendtable
short_description: We give employees wealth-building loans for their 401(k) match and…
long_description:
1 in 4 Americans do not get their full 401(k) match. That means 25 million workers are leaving $24 billion on the table in free employer contributions. The primary reason these workers cannot get their match is because they do not have enough to both cover living expenses and invest. 

Lendtable helps workers get thousands in additional income by giving them a cash advance to cover their living expenses so they can finally begin earning their employer match. Once their money has vested we take some of the match money earned in order to cover our expenses. 

Workers now have thousands of dollars more without putting any money down, and we make money helping them do so -- we win if they win.

name: Here
short_description: Personal, Shareable, Flexible Video Rooms
long_description: Here is a next generation video communication platform where teams and friends create personal, shareable and flexible video rooms.  We do this by providing a real-time, shared space where people meetup to video chat, write, draw, screenshare, decorate and move around--all in a browser.

name: Lume Health
short_description: Reviews, compensation data, and job recommendations for nurses
long_description:
Lume helps nurses quickly find their ideal jobs by providing them with access to thousands of trusted nurse-submitted reviews, salary data points, hospital profiles, and personalized job recommendations upfront.

Our goal is to become America’s most valuable network for nurses by becoming the go-to resource for nurses when it comes to making their next career decision.

name: MedPiper Technologies, Inc
short_description: Largest database of verified doctors and nurses in India
long_description: MedPiper connects verified Doctors and Nurses in India with hospitals, telemedicine platforms etc. that need them. With our credential verification and background checks on candidates, hospitals can now find quality staff better and faster.

name: MilkRun
short_description: Get Food From Farmers, Delivered.
long_description: Our team of farmers and chefs curate boxes of the finest quality local food for our customers each week. From seasonal produce, to humanely-handled pasture-raised meat, to organic eggs and dairy, there's something for every family. We deliver right to your door, as often as you want. Whether your family needs a delivery once a week or once a month, we're committed to helping you shop local. Delivery includes recipe suggestions, cooking videos, and more from our team of chefs. Whether you're looking for advice on how to roast a whole chicken or what that new-to-you vegetable is, we're here for you every step of the way.

name: Vena Vitals
short_description: A small sticker that monitors blood pressure continuously
long_description: Vena Vitals makes a small sticker that monitors blood pressure continuously. We've shown that it works in the operating room and is as accurate as the best tools doctors have today, at a fraction of the cost. We're a team of health tech scientists with multiple past startups and exits, and we've built products that have scaled to over 2M users.

name: inSoma Bio
short_description: Helping Plastic Surgeons Rebuild Fat

name: Glimpse
short_description: B2B marketplace for brands to buy product placements in short-term…
long_description: Brands can simply choose the number of properties they want to be in, and Glimpse connects them to properties interested in having their products available for their guests to use. Now, products like mattresses, coffee machines, furniture, soaps, and more have an alternative to retail that allows consumers to actually try the product in-person to understand its value.

name: Fancy
short_description: Mobile app in the UK, that delivers convenience store items in under…
long_description: On-demand grocery delivery company based in the UK. We delivers snacks, drinks and more in under 30 minutes.

name: Nestybox
short_description: Enables Linux containers to act as super fast & efficient VMs
long_description:
Nestybox creates software that enables Linux containers to act like virtual machines. This increases the use cases for containers and gives enterprises a less expensive and more flexible alternative to virtual machines in many scenarios. 

Our first product is a "container runtime", the software that creates the containers. It's called "Sysbox" and integrates with the popular Docker and Kubernetes engines, enabling these tools to deploy containers that act like virtual machines. 

This technology provides software engineers with an alternative to VMs, one that easier to use, much more efficiency, and easily migrated across clouds.

Hacker News Launch: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=24084758

name: Warmly,
short_description: Get warm qualified leads & reduce churn when your users change jobs

name: Byte
short_description: On-demand food delivery from virtual kitchens in Pakistan

name: Rally
short_description: Rally is Zoom for social events
long_description:
Rally is what Zoom breakouts should have been. Users can hop between groups easily, while seeing and hearing the other groups around them, as if they were in a shared space.   
Rally is perfect for happy hours, networking, and other social gatherings. We are being used by institutions like Amazon, Harvard and a multitude of startups across North America.

name: Mozart Data
short_description: The easiest way to set up a modern data stack
long_description: The explosion of SaaS tools means that more data is being siloed in places like Salesforce, Stripe, Shopify, and application databases.  Mozart collects, organizes, and orchestrates that data.  We manage a data warehouse for you, we manage ETL pipelines, and we manage the scheduling of data transformations. It’s the easiest way to gather data from whatever tools you are using, join it together, and start automating dashboards and generating insights -- in under an hour, without any engineering.

name: Artifact
short_description: Personal podcasts with the people in your life
long_description: Artifact captures the stories in your life with personal podcasts. We set you up with a professional interviewer through our marketplace and we make it easy, from scheduling to hosting interviews over the phone to delivering a polished edit that wouldn’t sound out of place on NPR.

name: Once
short_description: Mobile optimized storefronts for Shopify
long_description:
Once creates mobile optimized storefronts for Shopify.

2 things to know about the e-commerce space: mobile traffic is now the majority of all e-commerce traffic, but mobile conversion rates are 50% lower than desktop.

This is because all of the e-commerce platforms that have reached scale are built desktop first.

At Once we’ve solved this by copying a design that’s already proven to work on mobile: the Instagram story. We give Shopify sellers a mobile storefront that looks and feels like a story.

name: Reflect
short_description: No-code test automation for web apps
long_description: Reflect is a no-code tool for automated website testing. Instead of building and maintaining complex Selenium tests, companies use Reflect to run automated end-to-end tests without writing code.

name: Inspectify
short_description: A managed marketplace for home inspections.
long_description: Inspectify is a managed marketplace for home inspections. We give out software to real estate agents to instantly coordinate home inspections and receive repair estimates on all issues found.

name: Clover
short_description: The all-in-one notebook for creatives to brainstorm, write, and plan…
long_description: We built a new style of text editor from the ground up to better support creative thinking. Clover lets you explode traditional, linear documents into an infinite "surface" for a more intuitive, visual way of note-taking, brainstorming, mind-mapping, and managing tasks.

name: Zuddl
short_description: Zuddl helps large organisations host conferences online
long_description:
Zuddl lets large organisations create conferences online that can go live in minutes. We reproduce all aspects of a physical conference from one on one networking to expo showcases. 


Existing online conferences often feel like a one-way webinar where attendees have no impact on the outcome. It might as well be a pre-recorded video. On most platforms, all online events look the same. It’s easy for attendees and speakers to forget what they’re attending. Many customisable platforms that do exist take weeks or months to get your event up and running, we do it within minutes. 

At Zuddl, we’re building out a library of templates for all of the configurable elements of our conferences. You can build off of existing templates and get your event up and running within minutes. By mixing and matching our different event zones, you can reproduce all aspects of physical conferences online. Discussion tables facilitate organic group networking with easy switching between different tables. The expo zone can be used to showcase partner and sponsor booths. The backstage zone helps you run dry runs to ensure smooth event execution. With Zuddl, you can create fully branded conferences with engaging experiences.

name: Parrot Software 🦜
short_description: The operating system for restaurants in LatAm.
long_description: Parrot is the operating system for restaurants in LatAm. We consolidate restaurant’s 7+ sales channels into a single platform reducing their operational expenses while giving them tools they need to drive more sales. We’re toast for LatAm.

name: Parade
short_description: Parade creates unique, on-brand marketing collateral automatically.
long_description:
Parade is the central hub for your brand design.

Companies use our product to define their design system and then generate marketing emails, social media posts, and more, all without a graphic designer.

name: Hellosaurus
short_description: Interactive video platform for kids
long_description:
[Hellosaurus](http://www.hellosaurus.com) is an interactive video platform for kids filled with classes they can actually play instead of just watch. Top kids media creators and popular YouTube stars are already making content for our platform and transforming screen time into an active and fun experience. 

Hellosaurus is developing software tools for creators of high-quality kids programming to make truly participatory shows and a single distribution platform to share these creations with families everywhere. Experts in early childhood education have long stressed the importance of play for healthy cognitive and social development, and Hellosaurus supports this by empowering content creators to build enriching, interactive shows that engage kids as active participants rather than passive viewers.

name: Finch
short_description: Finch is the universal API for payroll and HR
long_description: Finch is the API to access payroll and HR systems. We allow admins to connect their company in a compliant and secure manner to applications. Finch integrates across providers enabling developers to access a previously closed system and are at the source of truth for employee data and money flow. Our API powers use cases across lending, insurance, benefits, FP&A, and HR applications.

name: Fieldguide
short_description: Modern software that transforms the way accounting firms work.
long_description: Fieldguide is a platform that powers the most complex compliance and financial audits performed by audit and advisory firms. With Fieldguide, firms save thousands of hours per year, transforming the operations of their practices and modernizing the experience of their clients.

name: Heron Data
short_description: We categorise and label bank transaction data
long_description: We are a software company that categorises and labels bank transaction data. If you think deciphering a transaction on your bank statement is hard for you, it’s way harder for your lender, personal finance manager, or neobank, so we offer an easy service to solve this problem.

name: ChatPay
short_description: The platform to create an online coaching business
long_description:
Chatpay allows anyone to create an online coaching business through WhatsApp or Telegram groups. For example a fitness coach can charge her audience to join an exclusive group where she will run an entire weight loss fitness program.

Covid killed lots of jobs and brought the need for people to reinvent themselves. This accelerated a larger trend of individuals building and charging their audience directly. Our top coach left her job as a lawyer and it's making $300k per year with her groups in Brazil

ChatPay is set to be the largest enabler of this new behavior because we are the only one reaching normal people where they actually are - on messenger apps. Chat wins over long-format content and has better engagement which makes it easier to become mainstream.

name: Flat
short_description: We’re the Opendoor of Mexico. We buy homes with an instant offer, fix…
long_description:
We provide instant offers to home sellers, saving them dozens of visits and time and resources they need to spend to sell a home.
We then renovate the home and sell it with guarantees that nobody else in the market offers: 30 day buyback guarantee, 6 months of
assistance and property insurance, 200+ inspection points, a smooth legal process, help with obtaining a mortgage.

name: Quell
short_description: Get fit fighting your way through a fantasy world.
long_description: Quell is an immersive fitness game where players get fit fighting their way through a fantasy world. Our low-cost wearable uses smart resistance bands to guide you through an exciting, effective combat workout at home. We’re Peloton meets gaming at 1/10th of the price

name: Todos Comemos
short_description: TodosComemos is the first ready-to-cook meal kit delivery service in…
long_description:
TodosComemos is a marketplace where you can buy premade meal ingredients that transform the way you cook. We seek that our users save time and stress, while being able to prepare lots of new dishes in simple steps.

Serving over 15 hundred homes in Bogota and Ciudad de Mexico, we are growing 2x every month in revenue in an overlooked market. 

We eliminate traditional intermediaries and long cooking experiences, connecting food production centers (and their pre-made meal ingredients) directly with customers.

name: Future Fields
short_description: Cell growth media for lab grown meat
long_description:
We make the most important ingredient for lab grown meat - cell growth media. We make cell growth media 1000 times cheaper than anyone else through our novel production system.

Future Fields started out as a lab grown meat company, focusing on chicken products. We developed our first prototype using cell culture media available on the market today. With this, the price of our chicken was $3000 US per lb. Would you buy a really good chicken nugget for $300? Probably not. 

We prioritized overcoming this hurdle first, and we were successful! We developed an entirely new way of producing growth factors - which are the key (and most expensive) component of cell culture media. We realized this technology could solve the same problem all lab grown meat companies face. 

Given our mission to singlehandedly kickstart the next agricultural revolution, we decided to pivot and focus on enabling the entire industry to succeed. Our cell culture media is affordable, scalable, and fully customizable to meet the specific needs of individual cell lines, from pork to kangaroo, and everything in between.

name: Revel Technologies
short_description: Making a better caffeine
long_description: We are making coffee for caffeine sensitive people. We do this by producing the world's first caffeine replacement, paraxanthine. It's better than caffeine at waking you up and causes fewer side effects, like anxiety and jitteriness.

name: Atmos
short_description: The entire homebuilding process, all online

name: SiPhox
short_description: Miniaturized medical diagnostics using the first circuit board for…
long_description: We replace a 100lb optical instrument with an area of silicon smaller than a postage stamp. Our technology enables a handheld CRISPR-based COVID test that can be scaled to a billion tests per week using a single standard silicon CMOS foundry.

name: Verifiable
short_description: API for healthcare compliance

name: Toolbox
short_description: On-demand labor marketplace for skilled construction workers
long_description:
Toolbox is building a better future of work for the 9M skilled construction workers earning over $300B in wages. Through our worker-centric labor marketplace, construction workers can showcase their background, secure full-time jobs, reduce their downtime through short-term gigs, and access basic financial services.

Construction workers get access to a mobile app to highlight their professional experience, keep track of their licenses and certifications, secure jobs and on-demand gigs. and can access direct, online payments for their work. 

Contractors and building owners can use our platform to reduce project delays by securing experienced tradespeople and skilled laborers for their projects.

name: CapWay
short_description: CapWay is a mobile bank for the financially underserved.
long_description:
CapWay is a mobile bank for the financially underserved in the U.S. We are creating economic opportunities and access to financial services for those who do not have access to or untrusting of traditional banking. 

The company has a B2C and B2B2C customer acquisition strategy.

name: Matter
short_description: What's black and white and read all over?
long_description: Matter is a social reading app for articles, blogs, and newsletters. Currently in private beta on iOS.

name: Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals
short_description: Novel Psychedelic-Inspired Therapeutics For Treating Mental Illness
long_description: Gilgamesh is a discovery and early development biotech company developing small molecules complemented by biomarkers to treat mental illness. The company leverages deep expertise in the medicinal chemistry and neuroscience of psychedelic compounds to develop innovative medicines.

name: Gather
short_description: The Metaverse, starting with a 2D spatial video chat world
long_description:
We are building a virtual universe which fundamentally improves how people interact online.

Today, that means a powerful remote-social platform upon which people have run 1000+  conferences, convocations, weddings, classes of all kinds, game nights, birthday parties, university campuses, virtual offices, album release parties, and more.

In the future, this looks like a free, open platform for the Metaverse, where people will work, socialize, and connect. In such a future, people will be able to live their lives without many of the physical constraints of the real world.
